title: Start of Game music vocals
body: For the first 1:15 of the game what are the vocals that are playing with the ambient music? They are really good but I haven't found a source for any of them.

replies.body: Hello! Are you thinking of [Legends Never Die](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r6zIGXun57U)? We had a stripped down version of it hooked up during Worlds.
Do you mean the Star Guardian vocals?
